name: example1
description: The model defines a simple example model with a scalar input and two vector inputs, one with 'local' variability and one with 'continuous' variability.

input.name: scalar_input
input.description: A scalar input to the model.

input.name: vector_input
input.description: A vector of input variables with variability discrete.

input.name: vector_input_discrete
input.description: Inputs have variability discrete by default.
